channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Playground, 10th June
item.description:
The play equipment in the park is no longer fit for purpose, broken equipment causing a safeguarding issue for children of all ages. Children trying to use the equipment appropriately are being injured as maintenance has not been performed for several years: • Roundabout doesnt even spin and the wood is all lifting • Rubber mulch is broken in many places around the playground aswel as my own children i have seen many other children trip of all different ages. • The rocker spring is still exposed & this hasnt been fixed in 5 years • the 2nd small red slide / climb equipment is still broken. Small children dont understand not to always use it. • the platforms on the centre bigger climbing frame have been broken and not replaced Local families are in need of this space as a community centre for children to play safely and learn social skills.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barnes Cray Road, Barnes Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Overhanging tree dangerous, 10th June
item.description:
This tree keeps growing over the footpath. I have scratched my head twice drawing blood. It hangs low enough that even short people have to duck out of the way.

item.title: Large sinkhole opening up in the middle of the lane of traffic travelling towards elephant &castle, 10th June
item.description:
Large sinkhole opening up in the middle of the lane of traffic travelling towards elephant &castle Impossible to get a photo but it is big and could easily be 1/2 the depth of a small tyre - it would cause a motorbike or bike or moped to tip a rider off.

item.title: Rat infestation in communal bin area, 9th June
item.description:

item.title: Noisy manhole cover, 9th June
item.description:
There is a manhole at the traffic lights on norwood road heading upto tule hill which makes a loud bang everytime a car drives over it. It's got worse and I can hear it when trying to sleep at night.
